title: Create Humbo Bumbo gaming platform with play-to-earn mechanics

requirements.text: Create a user wallet system that tracks user balance in the backend with deposit and withdrawal functionality
acceptanceCriteria: Users have a persistent wallet balance stored in backend
Users can view their current balance
System supports deposit operations to add funds
System supports withdrawal operations to remove funds

requirements.text: Implement a game selection interface showing available games with entry fees and potential winnings
acceptanceCriteria: Display a list or grid of available games
Each game shows its entry fee amount
Each game shows potential winning amount
Users can select a game to play

requirements.text: Build a betting system where users can place bets from their wallet balance before starting a game
acceptanceCriteria: Users can select bet amount before game starts
Bet amount is deducted from user wallet balance
Users cannot bet more than their available balance
Bet is recorded in backend before game begins

requirements.text: Create at least one playable game mechanic with win/lose conditions
acceptanceCriteria: Implement an interactive game that users can play
Game has clear win and lose conditions
Game outcome is determined by gameplay
Game completion triggers result processing

requirements.text: Implement win/loss resolution that credits winnings to user wallet on victory or records loss
acceptanceCriteria: Winning outcomes credit prize amount to user wallet
Losing outcomes are recorded without crediting funds
Game results are persisted in backend
Users can see updated balance after game completion

requirements.text: Build a game history view showing past games played with bet amounts, outcomes, and winnings
acceptanceCriteria: Display list of user's past games
Each entry shows game name, bet amount, outcome (win/loss), and amount won or lost
History is paginated or scrollable for many entries
History persists across sessions

requirements.text: Design a vibrant, exciting gaming interface with a creative visual theme featuring energetic colors, bold typography, and engaging layouts that evoke the thrill of competitive gaming and winning
acceptanceCriteria: Interface uses a cohesive color palette that is energetic and attention-grabbing
Typography is bold and reflects gaming aesthetics
Layout design creates excitement and engagement
Design is applied consistently across all pages

requirements.text: Render generated logo and game background images as static assets in frontend/public/assets/generated
acceptanceCriteria: Generated images are placed in frontend/public/assets/generated directory
Images are referenced correctly in frontend code
Logo appears in appropriate locations (header, favicon, etc.)
Background images enhance visual appeal of game interface

constraints: Use Motoko for all backend logic in a single main actor
Use React with TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and React Query for frontend
Do not modify immutable paths: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui
No external payment gateways or real money transactions - simulate in-app currency system only
nonGoals: Integration with external payment processors or banking systems
Social media integration or sharing features

required: Bold, energetic logo for Humbo Bumbo gaming platform with playful typography and vibrant colors (humbo-bumbo-logo.dim_256x256.png)
Exciting game background with dynamic patterns and bright colors suggesting competition and winning (game-background.dim_1920x1080.png)
